DesignerItem.Content: <Grid ToolTip="Room" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Rectangle Name="RoomRectangle"><Rectangle.Style><Style TargetType="Rectangle"><Style.BasedOn><Style TargetType="Rectangle"><Style.Resources><ResourceDictionary /></Style.Resources><Setter Property="Shape.Fill"><Setter.Value><LinearGradientBrush StartPoint="0,0" EndPoint="0,1"><LinearGradientBrush.GradientStops><GradientStop Color="#FFFAFBE9" Offset="0" /><GradientStop Color="#FFFFA500" Offset="1" /></LinearGradientBrush.GradientStops></LinearGradientBrush></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.Stroke"><Setter.Value><SolidColorBrush>#FFD69436</SolidColorBrush></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.StrokeThickness"><Setter.Value><s:Double>1</s:Double></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.StrokeLineJoin"><Setter.Value><x:Static Member="PenLineJoin.Round" /></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.Stretch"><Setter.Value><x:Static Member="Stretch.Fill" /></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="UIElement.IsHitTestVisible"><Setter.Value><s:Boolean>False</s:Boolean></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="UIElement.SnapsToDevicePixels"><Setter.Value><s:Boolean>True</s:Boolean></Setter.Value></Setter></Style></Style.BasedOn><Style.Resources><ResourceDictionary /></Style.Resources></Style></Rectangle.Style></Rectangle><TextBlock Text="ROOM1" TextWrapping="Wrap" Name="RoomText" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /></Grid>

<Grid ToolTip="Object" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Rectangle Name="ObjectRectangle"><Rectangle.Style><Style TargetType="Rectangle"><Style.BasedOn><Style TargetType="Rectangle"><Style.Resources><ResourceDictionary /></Style.Resources><Setter Property="Shape.Fill"><Setter.Value><LinearGradientBrush StartPoint="0,0" EndPoint="0,1"><LinearGradientBrush.GradientStops><GradientStop Color="#FFFEFEFE" Offset="0" /><GradientStop Color="#FFBDBEDE" Offset="1" /></LinearGradientBrush.GradientStops></LinearGradientBrush></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.Stroke"><Setter.Value><SolidColorBrush>#FFACADCD</SolidColorBrush></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.StrokeThickness"><Setter.Value><s:Double>1</s:Double></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.StrokeLineJoin"><Setter.Value><x:Static Member="PenLineJoin.Round" /></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="Shape.Stretch"><Setter.Value><x:Static Member="Stretch.Fill" /></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="UIElement.IsHitTestVisible"><Setter.Value><s:Boolean>False</s:Boolean></Setter.Value></Setter><Setter Property="UIElement.SnapsToDevicePixels"><Setter.Value><s:Boolean>True</s:Boolean></Setter.Value></Setter></Style></Style.BasedOn><Style.Resources><ResourceDictionary /></Style.Resources></Style></Rectangle.Style></Rectangle><TextBlock Text="OBJECT1" TextWrapping="Wrap" Name="ObjectText" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" /></Grid>

Root.AdventureGame:
<AdventureGameDesignerApi xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/DiagramDesigner.AdventureWorld.Domain"><Exits /><GameLoopProcessCode>TO MYFUNCTION X [ PRINTLN "HELLO" ]
DO MYFUNCTION 1 </GameLoopProcessCode><Introduction>This is a test of a script
I hope you like it</Introduction><MaxScore>2</MaxScore><MaximumInventorySize>4</MaximumInventorySize><PlaceableObjects><PlaceableObject><ControlId>19e69511-b0a2-4f81-95af-20f0f5ab94ee</ControlId><Descriptions xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays"><d4p1:string>This is a key</d4p1:string></Descriptions><IsDestroyed>false</IsDestroyed><Name>OBJECT1</Name><ObjectPreprocssCode i:nil="true" /><StartState>0</StartState><InventoryDescription>Key</InventoryDescription><IsHeld>false</IsHeld><IsTakeable>true</IsTakeable><ShortDescription>Key</ShortDescription><StartRoomId i:nil="true" /></PlaceableObject></PlaceableObjects><Rooms><Room><ControlId>6cccd298-e9f2-4747-99ea-256e6e188b9a</ControlId><Descriptions xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays"><d4p1:string>You are in the shop</d4p1:string></Descriptions><IsDestroyed>false</IsDestroyed><Name>ROOM1</Name><ObjectPreprocssCode i:nil="true" /><StartState>0</StartState></Room></Rooms><StartRoomId>6cccd298-e9f2-4747-99ea-256e6e188b9a</StartRoomId><Title>Script Test</Title><WonGame>You have won the game</WonGame></AdventureGameDesignerApi>
